name: tropical-island
description:
This Textual Inversion has trained publicly available images of Tropical Island with a Stable Diffusion 1.5 with 12 images at a scale of 512x512.

Works best with DPM++ 2M Karras.

Tested on SD 1.5 and hasdx_hasedsdx (NSFW)

The latest version is trained at 5400 steps.

So use tropical-island or tropical-island-5400 in a prompt to trigger this textual inversion

Here The Prompt

(As the sun sets on this remote tropical island, the sky is painted with a fiery glow, as if the nearby volcano has erupted and spilled its lava into the air. The dramatic scenery is only heightened by the crystal-clear water that reflects the colors of the sky, creating an otherworldly ambiance that is truly unforgettable),tropicalparadise, remoteisland, untouchednature, purewater, lushgreenery, secludedparadise, naturalwonderland, hiddenbeauty, crystalclearwater, densejungle, vibrantfoliage, highqualityimages, photorealism, camerasettings, daylightlighting, realpictures, 8Kresolution, islandescape, breathtakingviews, exoticwildlife, naturalhabitat, unspoiledparadise, serenitynow, peacefulretreat, wanderlustdestination, offthebeatenpath, escapethecity, ecoadventure, sustainabletourism, conservationefforts, tropical-island-5400
